products.name: Founder's Shield

includes: Privacy Shield Year 1 (Florida Hub default - your home stays private)
Founder's Playbook PDF (10-page guide: banking, taxes, compliance 101)

products.name: Medical PLLC Node
products.description: Never think about LLC paperwork again - Professional LLC for licensed medical practitioners
products.value_proposition: Saves you 3+ hours of confusion navigating FL-621 compliance requirements
includes: Annual Report Reminder Service (60-day deadline alerts per FL-605.0210)

annual_report_reminder.name: Annual Report Reminder Service
includes: Automated email 60 days before May 1 deadline (FL-605.0210)
Deadline calendar with statutory filing dates
annual_report_reminder.upl_safe: Factual reminders only - no legal advice on compliance

board_license_monitor.name: Board License Status Monitor
board_license_monitor.data_source: FL Board of Medicine/Nursing/Dentistry/Pharmacy public databases
board_license_monitor.value: Doctor losing medical license due to missed renewal = $200K+ problem. Monitor solves this for $499.
board_license_monitor.upl_safe: Displays factual license status from public database only - no compliance opinion. Example: 'Your FL medical license #12345 expires on [date].'

benefits: Quarterly statutory update webinars (factual changes only)

products.target_customer: Physicians, dentists, nurses, pharmacists, licensed healthcare providers
products.time_savings: 3+ hours of FL-621 research and compliance navigation
products.roi_justification: At $200-400/hr physician rate, $499 saves $600-1200 in avoided mistakes and time

products.name: Trade Professional LLC
products.tagline: Your license. Your business. Zero state headaches.
products.description: Never worry about DBPR deadlines or losing your license to paperwork
products.value_proposition: The only LLC service with DBPR integration and automated compliance tracking
includes: Department of Business and Professional Regulation integration

license_dashboard.name: License Dashboard
features: DBPR license status display (active/expired/suspended - pulled from state database)
Workers' comp filing status (filed/not filed - factual only)
Annual report filing status (filed/not filed per FL-605.0210)
Upcoming statutory deadlines (May 1 annual report, license renewal dates)
Automated deadline alerts 60 days before due dates
license_dashboard.value: Never miss a statutory deadline - worth $200+
license_dashboard.upl_safe: Displays facts from public records only - no compliance opinions

workers_comp_helper.name: Workers' Comp Verification Helper
checks: Employee count threshold (1+ employees requires workers' comp per statute)
Current filing status from state database (filed/not filed - factual only)
workers_comp_helper.display_example: FL statute 440.107 requires workers' comp if you have 1+ employees. Your filing status: [filed/not filed].
workers_comp_helper.value: Automatic workers' comp requirement verification - prevents state penalties
workers_comp_helper.upl_safe: Factual only - displays statutory requirement and filing status from public records. No compliance advice.

products.target_customer: General contractors, electrical contractors, plumbing contractors, roofing contractors
products.roi_justification: At $75-150/hr contractor rate, $599 saves $1,500-3,000 vs hiring lawyer + avoids license suspension risk

products.name: The Legacy Will
products.tagline: Your family gets access automatically. No probate lawyer needed.
products.hero_feature: Legacy Timer + Self-proving affidavit = your legacy protected, zero court drama
products.description: The only will service with automatic successor access via Legacy Timer
products.value_proposition: Peace of mind: your family won't fight, and probate court fees are eliminated
includes: Legacy Timer - automatic successor access (15-day In Extremis buffer with veto protection)
Self-proving affidavit (FL-732.503 - saves $1,500+ in probate court testimony fees)
Will Completion Checker - verifies mechanical requirements before signing
Successor Test Run - test Legacy Timer flow before activation

dead_mans_switch.name: Legacy Timer
dead_mans_switch.description: Your successors get automatic vault access after 15-day In Extremis buffer
workflow: You designate successors with PIN codes
If no activity for 360 hours (15 days), system initiates In Extremis mode
Email/SMS alerts sent to you for veto
If no veto, successors get automatic access to Tier 4 vault (will, documents)
dead_mans_switch.value: No probate lawyer needed to access your will - automatic, instant, secure
dead_mans_switch.upl_safe: Technical workflow only - no legal advice on estate planning

successor_test_run.name: Successor Test Run
successor_test_run.description: Test the Legacy Timer flow in non-activated mode
workflow: See exactly what successors will receive
successor_test_run.value: Builds trust - see how it works BEFORE you die
successor_test_run.upl_safe: Pure technical workflow test - no legal validation of will contents

will_completion_checker.name: Will Completion Checker
checks: FL-732 statutory requirement checklist (mechanical requirements only)
will_completion_checker.value: Catches missing mechanical requirements before notarization
will_completion_checker.upl_safe: Checks for missing mechanical requirements only - NOT legal sufficiency or quality of will provisions

self_proving_affidavit.benefit: Eliminates need for witness testimony during probate (per statute)
self_proving_affidavit.savings: $1,500-3,000 in court costs and attorney fees (typical probate)
self_proving_affidavit.upl_safe: Factual statement of statutory benefit - not legal advice

products.target_customer: Estate planning, succession planning, will execution, legacy preservation, founders with family
products.roi_justification: Probate attorney charges $3,000-8,000 to fix broken DIY will. Self-proving affidavit alone saves $1,500+ in court fees. 4-10x ROI on $399.
